# sampleBufferDelegate

**Instance Property**

The capture object’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
var sampleBufferDelegate: (any AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate)? { get }
```

## Discussion

You use the delegate to manage incoming data.

## Receiving captured audio data

- **setSampleBufferDelegate(_:queue:)**: Sets the delegate that will accept captured buffers and the dispatch queue on which the delegate will be called.
- **sampleBufferCallbackQueue**: The queue on which delegate callbacks are invoked
- **AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate**: Methods for receiving audio sample data from an audio capture.
